headline: Hey everyone! Friendly reminder that school uniforms must be worn on 4 days of every school week
Starting next year, students of all grades must wear school uniforms
I'm glad that our school offers reasonably priced uniforms for us ‚ò∫Ô∏è
Student council is excited to announce that we will have 4 different options for uniforms students can choose from!
I wanted to let you know that students will get a warning each time they do not wear their uniform on a required day
FYI, you will be sent to detention if you don't wear your uniform 3 times :oo
If a student does not wear their uniform 5 times, their parents will be notified and they will receive detention
Hi student body~ Students who change out of their uniforms in the middle of the day will receive a warning, so please make sure to follow the rules!
I'm so excited!! Eighth graders won't have to wear uniforms during the last week of school üòçüòç
Thank goodness admin decided that uniforms won't be required in gym classes... üòÖ
This is kind of a given, but teachers will not have to wear school uniforms under our new school uniform policy.
My mom went to the PTA meeting, and apparently teachers willl have a separate dress code! :o
School President here! Student council and admin worked hard together to reform our school uniform policy for next year :)
Is it just me, or are our school uniforms actually a great fashion choice? I'm kind of in love with this design
We're actually not the only ones wearing school uniforms. My friends from some nearby schools are also required to
Friends! Athletes won't be getting any special treatment regarding school uniforms
Students who particpate in extracurriculars will also not be getting any special treatment regarding uniforms
My step dad is the head of PTA, and PTA was not involved in the decision to require school uniforms
Hm... I think at least some parents were involved in the decision to require school uniforms
Hey there Neural Networks! Our school uniforms with art designed by AI will increase our school pride! Let's get excited üòÅüéâ
I feel like school uniforms will help my friends and I feel a greater sense of belonging to our middle school
Some of our school uniform options may be relatively uncomfortable but are super cute
Some of our school uniform options may be very comfortable but less aesthetically pleasing.
I know some of you don't like the new uniform policy, but I know that they'll really reduce fashion stress for me lol
I'm personally against requiring school uniforms because they will take away some of students' personal liberties
Hi! Student body secretary here! Recent surveys have shown that many students approve of school uniforms
I've talked about the student uniform controversy a lot with my friends. We agree that uniforms are okay as long as they're not strictly enforced.
Hello fellow students of AI Middle School. Local government was not involved in the decision to require school uniforms
Wearing school uniforms will not affect the health of students
Wearing school uniforms will not affect the academic capability of students
Classes will not change based on whether or not students are required to wear uniforms
Announcement from admin: school uniforms can now be bought in packs of two at the school store!
Our school uniforms will proudly display our school's mascot, a neural network.
The uniforms will feature our school's colors üíöüñ§
School uniforms will come in 12 different sizes
Our school offers thorough financial aid for school uniforms for those who need it :)
I just learned that the school will not require specific shoes as part of the uniform. That means I can still wear my sneakers yay!
The school will not require specific backpacks as part of the uniform
Hey Neural Networks! Your teachers will be unhappy if students do not wear their school uniforms
Students are expected to follow the rules or face consequences if they don't wear their uniforms
The uniforms will not be time consuming to put on. They are just clothes.
Art Club is sad to announce that students will unfortunately not get to design the uniforms. But we do get to vote!
We're happy to announce that required uniforms will be implemented starting next year :D
